TextLibrary.Text: You have failed to defeat the Giant Wasp
You have defeated the Giant Wasp. You must now take it's stinger back to Neehi.
Neehi pays you for the Wasp Stinger.
You must travel to Wasp Hive to win a Wasp Stinger. Stingers can only be won in battle.
You must now return to Gruuldok to recieve your reward.
